name: The Arc (Chapter 1)
description:
The Arc is a size-based visual novel, created in collaboration with the talented artist VRSeverson and lazy developer Thaw87.

The story is about a tiny elvish tribe living their life in a backyard and being busy with their everyday struggle. Little did they know that a family of 3 women about to move into their new house causing some serious trouble in their tiny ecosystem.

The player starts as the tribe's only merchant, ready for a trip to a nearby village just to learn about little plots of the past and ground-breaking facts about his once tiny world.

Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/thearcgame

Note that the Android build is currently in beta stage
